attributes.title: WORST APP EVER 😠
attributes.review: the screen keeps blacking out when i open up the app and i just find this whole app to be too bothersome and unnecessary. i really hope this gets taken down because it doesn't even deserve to be on the apple app store.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: When I would use this app it constantly crashed and I found hidden statements through out the app which were all racist which I do not condone what so ever. It’s disgusting and works horribly and needs to be taken down. 💜btw trump is racist so please take this app down bc nobody wants this app here 💕✨

attributes.title: Not enough
attributes.review:
I am purely FULL of anger!

This app doesn’t have the top quality amount of homophobia, racism, transphobia, xenophobic energy I get from the fat mans twitter. I think for further improvements, the incompetent fat orange himself can fix the following.

1. Take this app off the AppStore
2. Delete his twitter account
3. Force VP Pence to resign
4. Have Trump resign himself
5. Put Nancy Pelosi in power
6. Have Biden win 2020
7. Fix everything that Trump messed up
8. Force Trump to live in a cage like he forced all the immigrants to do.

Strictly following this will make me LOVE the app! Shouldn’t be too difficult as everyone else will also LOVE these much needed updates!

Much love xoxo

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD - NOT SAFE
attributes.review: I’ve been getting always nonstop messages from this and it’s even affected my ads. It got to the point where I couldn’t even eat my dog because it kept interrupting me. Total mood killer.

attributes.title: Unbelievable
attributes.review: Today I was on this app and I found that there were so many different animals
